availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Hannah Hannah. Father of Charles Hannah and Laura Hannah. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860. Employed Kate Quinland as a domestic servant in Bracken County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 66; Find A Grave, "John W Hannah (1832 - 1901)," Memorial #71753344, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=71753344 (accessed October 20, 2017).
